## Cartesian2dTraceEntityConnector class

Generates traces in increments of 2, 5 or 10 in order to fit within maxTraceCount. The actual trace count may be up to maxTraceCount + 1.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Cartesian2dTraceEntityConnector<TCtor extends TTypedArrayCtor> implements ICartesian2dTraceEntityConnector<InstanceType<TCtor>> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ICartesian2dTraceEntityConnector](./cartesian-2d.icartesian2dtraceentityconnector.md)<!-- -->&lt;InstanceType&lt;TCtor&gt;&gt;
